Name: Gloria
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: A tequila sour topped with champagne or a tequila French 75 .
Nutrition: One serving of Gloria contains 140 calories
